# type

**Instance Property**

The type of the call action.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: CXPlayDTMFCallAction.ActionType { get set }
```

## Discussion

For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXPlayDTMFCallAction/ActionType].

## Accessing Action Information

- **digits**: The digits tapped by the user into the in-call keypad or included in the dial string.
